cookingTips: Leave small potatoes unpeeled for better texture and to prevent waterlogged potatoes
Boil until just fork-tender, about 15-20 minutes, to maintain structure
Toss warm potatoes gently with softened butter and fresh chives for even coating
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This simple side dish highlights the natural sweetness of waxy red potatoes. How can you add richness with butter and fresh herbaceous chives without overwhelming the potato flavor?
